verses.verse: Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "Heaven <S%H8064><s%> is my throne, <S%H3678><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> is my footstool: <S%H7272><s%> what kind of house <S%H1004><s%> will you build <S%H1129><s%> to me? <S%H4725><s%> and what place shall be my rest? <S%H4496><s%>

For all these things has my hand <S%H3027><s%> made, <S%H6213><s%> and so all these things came to be, <S%H5002><s%>" says Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> "but to this man will I look, <S%H5027><s%> even to him who is poor <S%H6041><s%> and of a contrite <S%H5223><s%> spirit, <S%H7307><s%> and who trembles <S%H2730><s%> at my word. <S%H1697><s%>

He who kills <S%H7819><s%> an ox <S%H7794><s%> is as he who kills <S%H5221><s%> a man; <S%H376><s%> he who sacrifices <S%H2076><s%> a lamb, <S%H7716><s%> as he who breaks <S%H6202><s%> a dog <S%H3611><s%>'s neck; <S%H6202><s%> he who offers <S%H5927><s%> an offering, <S%H4503><s%> as he who offers pig <S%H2386><s%>'s blood; <S%H1818><s%> he who burns <S%H2142><s%> frankincense, <S%H3828><s%> as he who blesses <S%H1288><s%> an idol. <S%H205><s%> Yes, <S%H977><s%> they have chosen their own ways, <S%H1870><s%> and their soul <S%H5315><s%> delights <S%H2654><s%> in their abominations: <S%H8251><s%>

I also will choose <S%H977><s%> their delusions, <S%H8586><s%> and will bring <S%H935><s%> their fears <S%H4035><s%> on them; <S%H7121><s%> because when I called, no one answered; <S%H1696><s%> when I spoke, <S%H1696><s%> they didn't <S%H8085><s%> listen; but they did <S%H6213><s%> that which was evil <S%H7451><s%> in my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and chose <S%H977><s%> that in which I didn't <S%H2654><s%> delight."

Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you who tremble <S%H2730><s%> at his word: <S%H1697><s%> "Your brothers <S%H251><s%> who hate <S%H8130><s%> you, <S%H5077><s%> who cast you out for my name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake, <S%H559><s%> have said, <S%H3068><s%> 'Let Yahweh be glorified, <S%H3513><s%> that we may see <S%H7200><s%> your joy; <S%H8057><s%>' but it is those who shall be disappointed. <S%H954><s%>

A voice <S%H6963><s%> of tumult <S%H7588><s%> from the city, <S%H5892><s%> a voice <S%H6963><s%> from the temple, <S%H1964><s%> a voice <S%H6963><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> that renders <S%H7999><s%> recompense <S%H1576><s%> to his enemies. <S%H341><s%>
"Before she travailed, <S%H2342><s%> she brought forth; <S%H3205><s%> before her pain <S%H2256><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> she delivered <S%H4422><s%> a son. <S%H2145><s%>

Who has heard <S%H8085><s%> such a thing? <S%H7200><s%> who has seen such things? <S%H776><s%> Shall a land be born in one <S%H259><s%> day? <S%H3117><s%> shall a nation <S%H1471><s%> be brought forth <S%H2342><s%> at once? <S%H6471><s%> for as <S%H1571><s%> soon as <S%H1571><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> travailed, <S%H2342><s%> she brought forth <S%H3205><s%> her children. <S%H1121><s%>

Shall I bring to the birth, <S%H7665><s%> and not cause to bring forth? <S%H3205><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> "shall I <S%H589><s%> who cause to bring forth <S%H3205><s%> shut <S%H6113><s%> the womb? <S%H559><s%>" says your God. <S%H430><s%>

"Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> with Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and be glad <S%H1523><s%> for her, <S%H157><s%> all you who love her: <S%H7797><s%> rejoice for joy <S%H4885><s%> with her, <S%H56><s%> all you who mourn over her;

that you may nurse <S%H3243><s%> and be satisfied <S%H7646><s%> at the comforting <S%H8575><s%> breasts; <S%H7699><s%> that you may drink deeply, <S%H4711><s%> and be delighted <S%H6026><s%> with the abundance <S%H2123><s%> of her glory. <S%H3519><s%>"

For thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H5186><s%> I will extend peace <S%H7965><s%> to her like a river, <S%H5104><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> like an overflowing <S%H7857><s%> stream: <S%H5158><s%> and you will nurse. <S%H3243><s%> You will be carried <S%H5375><s%> on her side, <S%H6654><s%> and will be dandled <S%H8173><s%> on her knees. <S%H1290><s%>
As one <S%H376><s%> whom his mother <S%H517><s%> comforts, <S%H5162><s%> so will I comfort <S%H5162><s%> you; <S%H5162><s%> and you will be comforted in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>"

You will see <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H3820><s%> and your heart shall rejoice, <S%H7797><s%> and your bones <S%H6106><s%> shall flourish <S%H6524><s%> like the tender grass: <S%H1877><s%> and the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall be known <S%H3045><s%> toward his servants; <S%H5650><s%> and he will have indignation <S%H2194><s%> against his enemies. <S%H341><s%>

For, <S%H3068><s%> behold, Yahweh will come <S%H935><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> and his chariots <S%H4818><s%> shall be like the whirlwind; <S%H5492><s%> to render <S%H7725><s%> his anger <S%H639><s%> with fierceness, <S%H2534><s%> and his rebuke <S%H1606><s%> with flames <S%H3851><s%> of fire. <S%H784><s%>

For by fire <S%H784><s%> will Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> execute judgment, <S%H8199><s%> and by his sword, <S%H2719><s%> on all flesh; <S%H1320><s%> and the slain <S%H2491><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> shall be many. <S%H7231><s%>

"Those who sanctify <S%H6942><s%> themselves and purify <S%H2891><s%> themselves to go to the gardens, <S%H1593><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> one <S%H259><s%> in the midst, <S%H8432><s%> eating <S%H398><s%> pig <S%H2386><s%>'s flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and the abomination, <S%H8263><s%> and the mouse, <S%H5909><s%> they shall come to an end <S%H5486><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

"For I know their works <S%H4639><s%> and their thoughts: <S%H4284><s%> the time comes, <S%H935><s%> that I will gather <S%H6908><s%> all nations <S%H1471><s%> and languages; <S%H3956><s%> and they shall come, <S%H935><s%> and shall see <S%H7200><s%> my glory. <S%H3519><s%>

"I will set <S%H7760><s%> a sign <S%H226><s%> among them, <S%H7971><s%> and I will send such as escape <S%H6412><s%> of them to the nations, <S%H1471><s%> to Tarshish, <S%H8659><s%> Pul, <S%H6322><s%> and Lud, <S%H3865><s%> who draw <S%H4900><s%> the bow, <S%H7198><s%> to Tubal <S%H8422><s%> and Javan, <S%H3120><s%> to the islands <S%H339><s%> afar off, <S%H7350><s%> who have not heard <S%H8085><s%> my fame, <S%H8088><s%> neither have seen <S%H7200><s%> my glory; <S%H3519><s%> and they shall declare <S%H5046><s%> my glory <S%H3519><s%> among the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

They shall bring <S%H935><s%> all your brothers <S%H251><s%> out of all the nations <S%H1471><s%> for an offering <S%H4503><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> on horses, <S%H5483><s%> and in chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and in litters, <S%H6632><s%> and on mules, <S%H6505><s%> and on dromedaries, <S%H3753><s%> to my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> as the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> their offering <S%H4503><s%> in a clean <S%H2889><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Of them also will I take <S%H3947><s%> for priests <S%H3548><s%> and for Levites, <S%H3881><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

"For as the new <S%H2319><s%> heavens <S%H8064><s%> and the new <S%H2319><s%> earth, <S%H776><s%> which I will make, <S%H6213><s%> shall remain <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, <S%H5002><s%>" says Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "so your seed <S%H2233><s%> and your name <S%H8034><s%> shall remain. <S%H5975><s%>

It shall happen, <S%H1767><s%> that from one new moon <S%H2320><s%> to another, <S%H2320><s%> and from <S%H1767><s%> one Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> to another, <S%H7676><s%> shall all flesh <S%H1320><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to worship <S%H7812><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, <S%H559><s%>" says Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

"They shall go forth, <S%H3318><s%> and look <S%H7200><s%> on the dead bodies <S%H6297><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> who have transgressed <S%H6586><s%> against me: <S%H8438><s%> for their worm shall not die, <S%H4191><s%> neither shall their fire <S%H784><s%> be quenched; <S%H3518><s%> and they will be loathsome <S%H1860><s%> to all mankind. <S%H1320><s%>"
